## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G05540](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G05540)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>TCTP2</u>
- **Gene Name:** Translationally Controlled Tumor Protein 2
- **Description:**   Methionine sulfoxide reductase (MSS4-like) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G05540.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G05540.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_045146]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Homozygous SALK_045146 insertional mutants display lethality during early rosette development, accumulation of anthocyanins in leaves; no mutants survive after this stage. Heterozygous SALK_045146 insertional mutants also show a stunted phenotype, developmental delay, including small roots. Bolting occurs up to 50 days after germination in heterozygous plants, and lack seconndary roots.
